alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:53PM EDT until July 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Shelby County in central Indiana... Southwestern Hancock County in central Indiana... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Greenfield, or 13 miles east of Indianapolis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Shelby and southwestern Hancock Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
